Subjects: carols, to Virgin Mary; Virgin Mary, carols to
_description: A carol to the Virgin Mary — seven quatrains (abab) and burden (cc): ‘Nouus sol de virgine / Reluxit nobis hodie’

BodArcSelB26.First Lines:
Thow holy douȝter of Syonprincesse of
                    hierusalem…
BodArcSelB26.Last Lines:
…The fadres wysdom to encloseþu were the temple &
                    tour also
